title: 6 [rc4] endless search_lucene debug messages
body:
my owncloud.log is filled with theese debug messages:

debug	search_lucene	adding /music/projekteva-letitrain.mp3	2013-12-11t10:59:15+00:00
debug	search_lucene	removing 5:/music/projekteva-letitrain.mp3 from index	2013-12-11t10:59:15+00:00
debug	search_lucene	found 1 hits	2013-12-11t10:59:15+00:00
debug	search_lucene	searching hits for pk:ece953689c01e678f5ffd6a99fbdc4dd	2013-12-11t10:59:15+00:00


debug	oc\files\cache\scanner	!!! no reuse of etag for 'files/music/projekteva-letitrain.mp3' !!! cache: array ( [fileid] => 11 [storage] => home::enoch [path] => files/music/projekteva-letitrain.mp3 [parent] => 3 [name] => projekteva-letitrain.mp3 [mimetype] => audio/mpeg [mimepart] => audio [size] => 5034500 [mtime] => 1386759565 [storage_mtime] => 1386759565 [encrypted] => 1 [unencrypted_size] => 3764804 [etag] => 52a8458d7dbba ) data: array ( [mimetype] => audio/mpeg [mtime] => 1385995728 [size] => 5034500 [etag] => 52a8458d7eb50 [storage_mtime] => 1385995728 )   2013-12-11t10:59:25+00:00

i donâ´t know what it means, but i thought it would be good to report it. :)

### server configuration

operating system: ubuntu server 12.04 lts

web server: apache 2.2.22

database: mysql 5

php version: 5.3

owncloud version: 6 rc4
